questions.question: The points where the amplitude of the wave is maximum and the strain is least

explanations.a: Nodes are points of no displacement.
explanations.b: Correct — anti-nodes have maximum amplitude and minimal strain.
explanations.d: Incorrect — anti-nodes is the correct answer.

questions.question: In transverse wave, the particle displacement is .............. to the direction of wave propagation

explanations.a: Correct — transverse waves displace particles perpendicular to wave motion.
explanations.c: Incorrect — not applicable to transverse waves.
explanations.d: Incorrect — there is a defined perpendicular relationship.

questions.question: The length of the fundamental wave is equal to

explanations.a: Correct — for a string fixed at both ends, fundamental wavelength = 2 × length.
explanations.b: Incorrect — that would be for the second harmonic.
explanations.c: Incorrect — typical for closed pipe resonance.
explanations.d: Incorrect — higher harmonics involve multiples of λ/2.
